name: Ding! Game Board
description:
An easy way to keep score when playing the Ding! card game from Wiggles 3D.

This easy-to-use app makes it simple to track scores when you are playing the Ding! card game.

- Add player names
- Let players opt in or out
- Play the hand using your Ding! game
- Score how many tricks were won by each player
- Watch pawns move backward and forward on the virtual game board!

Ding! is a fun card game that combines elements from Poker and Euchre, while adding its own special twist. The game can be played with anywhere from 3 to 8 players.
